articles.title: Orion's Fireplace: Incredible New Image of the Flame Nebula - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Orion offers you a spectacular firework display to celebrate the holiday season and the new year in this new image from the European Southern Observatory (ESO). But no need to worry, this iconic constellation is neither exploding nor burning. The “fire” you s…
articles.content:
ByEuropean Southern ObservatoryJanuary 5, 2022
Do not let the image and the name of the depicted cosmic object fool you! What you see in this picture is not a wildfire, but the Flame Nebula and its … [+7843 chars]
